scripts.test:prepare: yarn build:icon && yarn copy:lib && yarn copy:assets:tauri && yarn build --no-bundle
scripts.test:e2e:linux: yarn test:prepare && xvfb-run yarn workspace tests-e2-js test
scripts.test:e2e:win32: yarn test:prepare && yarn workspace tests-e2-js test
scripts.test:e2e:darwin: echo 'E2E tests are not supported on macOS yet due to WebDriver limitations'
scripts.dev:tauri: yarn build:icon && yarn copy:assets:tauri && tauri dev
scripts.build:tauri:linux:win32: yarn download:bin && yarn build:icon && yarn copy:assets:tauri && yarn tauri build
scripts.build:tauri:darwin: yarn build:icon && yarn copy:assets:tauri && yarn tauri build --target universal-apple-darwin
scripts.build:core: cd core && yarn build && yarn pack
scripts.build:extensions: rimraf ./pre-install/*.tgz || true && yarn workspace @janhq/core build && cd extensions && yarn install && yarn workspaces foreach -Apt run build:publish
